div.h4: Thank you for being a member!
div.p: Aces Dance Collective (ADC) bridges geographic boundaries and dance skills as an incubator for amateur dances, choreographers, directors, and produces to explore and grow their creative skill sets. Through our inclusive and uplifting community, we build confidence for novice artists.
Here's the best way to use this website:

ul.li: ANNOUNCEMENTS - check this page regularly! Afsaneh will update it every week with everything you need to know/do for showcase!
PIECES - anything your choreograph has for you (tutorial/choreo vids, feedback notes, etc)
FORMS - forms you need to fill out + their due dates
CALENDAR - this has all ADC practice times with zoom link
CHOREO CORNER - to-do list and announcements for piece leaders
